snippet: The initial investigation indicated that the explosion, in Brentwood, “could be gas-related,” a Fire Department inspector said.
abstract: House explodes in Brentwood, NY, killing a toddler and injuring 14 other people; authorities say blast may have been caused by propane gas.
lead_paragraph: The initial investigation indicated that the explosion, in Brentwood, “could be gas-related,” a Fire Department inspector said.

headline.seo: Child Killed, 17 Hurt in Brentwood House Explosion
headline.main: Child Is Killed and 17 People Are Hurt as L.I. House Explodes
headline.print_headline: Child Is Killed and 14 People Are Hurt as L.I. House Explodes
